lines.text: This kittens really lost her mittens.
H-huh... good thing I'm not a mouse...
Ahh, but you are a mouse. A big, yellow mouse.
I want you to promise me you'll never run off like that again!
I won't. And I want you to promise me something too.
I want you... to call me Napoleon!

[laughs]
From now on, you're my little Napoleon.
Ahh... not a mouse... a dog. DOG MUST DIE!
